caption: Nate Archibald
infobox-image: Nate Archibald 1974.jpeg | Archibald with the Kansas City-Omaha Kings in 1974

Career history.1970-1976: Cincinnati Royals / Kansas City-Omaha Kings / Kansas City Kings

Career highlights and awards: NBA champion (1981) | 6× NBA All-Star (1973, 1975, 1976, 1980-1982) | NBA All-Star Game MVP (1981) | 3× All-NBA First Team (1973, 1975, 1976) | 2× All-NBA Second Team (1972, 1981) | NBA scoring champion (1973) | NBA assists leader (1973) | NBA anniversary team (50th, 75th) | No. 1 retired by Sacramento Kings | First-team All-WAC (1970) | No. 14 retired by UTEP Miners
